resources.string: "Manage linked devices"
"Start fresh with a new Digital ID"
"Backup password"
"Sent from an unconfirmed device"
"Sender\'s Digital ID has changed"
"Confirm device"
"Verify Digital ID of a user"
"Verify Digital ID of a user"
"%1$s\'s Digital ID has changed. %2$s"
"%1$s\'s %2$s Digital ID has changed. %3$s"
"%1$s\'s Digital ID has changed."
"%1$s\'s %2$s Digital ID has changed. %3$s"
"Withdraw verification of Digital ID"
"Encrypted by a user with an unverified Digital ID."
"You\'re about to go to your %1$s account to start fresh. Afterwards you\'ll be taken back to the app."
"Can\'t confirm? Go to your account to start fresh."
"Send anyway"

"The Digital ID of %1$s has changed, which means you can no longer be sure that nobody is listening in. You can send this message anyway, or you cancel for now and try again later after reverifying the Digital ID of %1$s."
"Your message was not sent because %1$s\'s Digital ID has changed"

"%1$s is using one or more unconfirmed linked devices, which means you can no longer be sure that nobody is listening in. You can send the message anyway, or you cancel for now and try again later after %2$s has confirmed all their linked devices."
"Your message was not sent because %1$s has not confirmed all linked devices"

"Some of your linked devices are unconfirmed, which means the message recipient can no longer be sure that nobody is listening in. You can send the message anyway, or you cancel for now and try again later after you have confirmed all of your linked devices."
"Your message was not sent because you have not confirmed all your linked devices"
"Message not sent because %1$s\'s Digital ID has changed."
"Message not sent because %1$s has not confirmed all their linked devices."
"Message not sent because you have not confirmed all of your linked devices."
"You need to confirm this device for access to historical messages"
"This message was blocked either because you did not confirm your device or because the sender needs to verify you."
